definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: He jabbed at the wild boar with his bayonet.
sentences.chinese: 他用刺刀猛刺那頭野豬。

sentences.english: Their bayonets glanced in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他們的刺刀在陽光下閃耀。

sentences.english: The drillmaster is drilling privates how to use bayonet.
sentences.chinese: 教官正在教士兵們使用刺刀。

sentences.english: Lee Jeong-led everyone in a bayonet fight with the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 李貞帶領大家同敵人拼刺刀。

sentences.english: He was dying of a bajonet wound.
sentences.chinese: 他死於一個刺刀的刀傷。

sentences.english: Your bayonet is actually a pretty good steak knife.
sentences.chinese: 你的刺刀實際上是一把完美的牛排餐刀。

sentences.english: Rusty bayonet, Liebgott. You wanna kill Germans?
sentences.chinese: 刺刀生鏽了，李高特。你想殺德國人嗎？

sentences.english: a bayonet was a tool with a worker at each end
sentences.chinese: 刺刀是一種兩頭站着工人的殺戮工具。

sentences.english: Do not place showy, leave your bayonet into the enemy's heart.
sentences.chinese: 不要擺花架子，把你們的刺刀插向敵人的心臟。

sentences.english: Many of the survivors were killed by machine gun fire and by bayoneting.
sentences.chinese: 那些幸運挺過來的人，則會被用機槍和刺刀殛斃。

sentences.english: In bayonets and the percussive sound of shield.
sentences.chinese: 在刺刀與盾牌的撞擊聲中。

sentences.english: I would never bare a bayonet on the anniversary of his death.
sentences.chinese: 在他逝世的忌日裏，我決不拔出刺刀。

sentences.english: His rifle with the bayonet fixed was leaning against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 他的上了刺刀的步槍斜靠在牆上。

sentences.english: They drove us at bayonet point to build blockhouses for them.
sentences.chinese: 他們用刺刀逼着我們給他們修碉堡。

sentences.english: As it is a cavalry carbine, it has no bayonet or socket for one.
sentences.chinese: 由於這是一個騎兵卡賓槍，它沒有一個刺刀或插座。

definition: devils/refers to 日本鬼子, wartime term insult for Japanese
(coll.) Arisaka Type 38 rifle (Japanese army rifle used 1905-1945)
